DOC.brief_title: High Versus Low SpO2 Oxygen Therapy Patients With Acute Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize either high ( SpO2 range ≥96 % ) low ( SpO2 range 90-92 % ) oxygen inform consent .
